title: Bone Glove
summaries: The Bone Glove is an Expert Mode-exclusive accessory obtained from the Treasure Bag dropped by Skeletron. It throws two crossed bones every time a weapon is used, at maximum once per second. The bones can bounce off walls three times or pierce two enemies before being destroyed, deal 25 classless damage, and additionally have 25 armor penetration.

statistics.Tooltip: Shoots crossbones at enemies while you are attacking
statistics.Sell: 2 GC
